eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.util

Interface WauzInventory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AchievementsMenu, ArrowMenu, CharacterRaceClassMenu, CharacterSlotMenu, CharacterWorldMenu, CitizenInteractionMenu, CraftingMenu, GroupMenu, GuildApplicationMenu, GuildOverviewMenu, LootContainer, PetOptionsMenu, PetOverviewMenu, QuestMenu, QuestRewardChooser, ShopBuilder, SkillMenu, TabardBuilder, TabardMenu, TravellingMenu, WauzDialog, WauzMenu, WauzModeMenu

    public interface WauzInventory
    An inventory that can be used as menu or for other custom interaction mechanics.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void destroyInventory(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryCloseEvent event)
      Cleans up everything, so the inventory can be closed.
      void selectMenuPoint(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
      Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click.

    • Method Detail

      • selectMenuPoint

        void selectMenuPoint(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click.
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory click event.

      • destroyInventory
